lstDialogOne: Your time has come, its time for you to rest.
Let son will take over from now.
It wont be an easy task for him, lets how well you have prepared him for the journey ahead.|p1
lstDialogTwo: Your illness is too far gone, and you are unfit to carry on your reign.
You have left no heir, and have made much enemies during your time.
I am not going hang around to see who wins.
